title: CBC Radio
text:
What's your go-to remedy for a rough day? For more than 800,000 people on Instagram, including Beyoncé and Ariana Grande, it's a 22-year-old dancer named Donté Colley.

The Canadian dancer and content creator lives in Scarborough, Ont. and gets his kicks from making motivational videos that combine upbeat music, inspirational phrases, dance and emojis.

Donté Colley with Tom Power in the q studio in Toronto. (Vivian Rashotte/CBC)

Colley joined q's Tom Power in studio to talk about how he first discovered his love of dance and what he gets out of making others feel good online.

"My ultimate goal is just to make someone smile," said Colley. "It's super cool to see that there are people out there who are in search of what I'm looking for, which is positivity on the internet."

You can find Colley on Instagram at @donte.colley.

Download our podcast or click 'Listen' near the top of this page to hear the full conversation with Donté Colley.

— Produced by ​Vanessa Nigro
description: Donté Colley is a 22-year-old dancer who has more than 800,000 fans on Instagram, including the likes of Beyoncé and Ariana Grande.
